TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CollectionChangedEventManager extends System.Windows.WeakEventManager

Docs.summary: Provides a implementation so that you can use the "weak event listener" pattern to attach listeners for the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks In order to be listeners in this pattern, your listener objects must implement <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener>. You do not need to implement <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener> on the class that is the source of the events.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void AddListener (System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged source, System.Windows.IWeakEventListener listener);
.method public static hidebysig void AddListener(class System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged source, class System.Windows.IWeakEventListener listener) cil managed

Docs.param: The object to add as a listener.
Docs.summary: Adds the specified listener to the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event of the specified source.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void RemoveListener (System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged source, System.Windows.IWeakEventListener listener);
.method public static hidebysig void RemoveListener(class System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged source, class System.Windows.IWeakEventListener listener) cil managed

Docs.summary: Removes the specified listener from the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event of the specified source.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void StartListening(object source) cil managed

Docs.summary: Begins listening for the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event on the specified source.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void StopListening(object source) cil managed

Docs.summary: Stops listening for the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event on the specified source.
